overview: 52-year-old Mitsuo Mameda, who was living in the depths of his life after failing to manage a snack bar and being in debt and having his wife and children run away from him, decided to step into the world of an AV actor by chance. Mameda, who was given the job of "juice actor", which is located at the lowest level among AV actors, met veteran soup actors Hachiya and Omae there and started living together. Suddenly, Yuria, a popular AV actress, appears before them, and she says that she wants to live with them. Seiji Nakamitsu, a veteran actor who has appeared in more than 500 pink movies, will play the main character, Mameda.
title: Father Actor Z
